titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Historical Collections, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library MS-42
titlepage.publisher: Historical Collections, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Historical Collections, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, University of Virginia
did.unittitle: Diploma and Certificate Collection, 1875-1972

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Diploma and Certificate Collection, Accession #MS-42, Historical Collections, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, University of Virginia, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The documents were donated by various individuals. James Reed's Moral Philosphy diploma was donated by Mrs. Leslie A. Faudree. The certificates for Margaret Rust were donated by Dr. and Mrs. Delmar Weaver. Addeane Calleigh donated Guy Miller's certificate.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection includes certificates and diplomas of various people, almost all associated with the University of Virginia. Most of the documents are from the University of Virginia but not all. The documents include diplomas and certificates for completion of medical school, nursing school, individual courses, and training courses.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The arrangement of the documents is alphabetical by the last name of the recipient.

did.unittitle: Diploma for Paul Brandon Barringer 1877 June 28

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for a Doctor of Medicine for Paul Barringer

did.unittitle: Certificate for Chalmers L. Gemmill 1941 July 8

scopecontent.p: Certificate from the U.S. Naval Air Station to designate Chalmers Gemmill an Aviation Medical Examiner

did.unittitle: Diploma for Chalmers Laughlin Gemmill 1926 June 8

scopecontent.p: Diploma from Johns Hopkins University for a Doctor of Medicine for Chalmers Gemmill

did.unittitle: Diploma for William T. Graham 1896 June 17

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for a Doctor of Medicine for William Graham

did.unittitle: Diploma for Dieter Gröschel 1958

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Cologne, Germany for Doctor medicine (magna cum laude) for Dieter Gröschel. Note that Dr. Gröschel has his own collection: Dieter Hans Max Gröschel Collection, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Department of Historical Collections and Services, MS 54 (http://ead.lib.virginia.edu/vivaxtf/view?docId=uva-hs/viuh00054.xml).

did.unittitle: Certificate for Dieter H.M. Gröschel 1965 July

scopecontent.p: Certificate from The American Academy of Microbiology for qualification in Medical and Public Health Microbiology for Dieter H.M. Gröschel. Note that Dr. Gröschel has his own collection: Dieter Hans Max Gröschel Collection, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Department of Historical Collections and Services, MS 54 (http://ead.lib.virginia.edu/vivaxtf/view?docId=uva-hs/viuh00054.xml).

did.unittitle: License for Dieter Hans Max Gröschel 1965 July 1

scopecontent.p: License from the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania Department of State for the practice of Medicine and Surgery in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania for Dieter Hans Max Gröschel. Note that Dr. Gröschel has his own collection: Dieter Hans Max Gröschel Collection, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Department of Historical Collections and Services, MS 54 (http://ead.lib.virginia.edu/vivaxtf/view?docId=uva-hs/viuh00054.xml).

did.unittitle: Certificate for Dieter Hans Max Gröschel 1969 September 18

scopecontent.p: Certificate from the Commonwealth of Massachusetts Board of Registration for registration as a qualified physician for Dieter Hans Max Gröschel. Note that Dr. Gröschel has his own collection: Dieter Hans Max Gröschel Collection, Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Department of Historical Collections and Services, MS 54 (http://ead.lib.virginia.edu/vivaxtf/view?docId=uva-hs/viuh00054.xml).

did.unittitle: Diploma for Washington B. Grove 1895 June 12

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in the M.D. Course in Physiology for Washington Grove

did.unittitle: Diploma for Washington B. Grove 1895 June 12

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in the M.D. Course in Anatomy for Washington Grove

did.unittitle: Diploma for Washington B. Grove 1896 June 17

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for a Doctor of Medicine for Washington Grove

did.unittitle: Diploma for B. Randolph Kennon 1892 June 29

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in the M.D. Course in Physiology for B. Randolph Kennon

did.unittitle: Diploma for B. Randolph Kennon 1892 June 29

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in the M.D. Course in Medical Jurisprudence for B. Randolph Kennon

did.unittitle: Diploma for B. Randolph Kennon 1892 June 29

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in the M.D. Course in chemistry for B. Randolph Kennon

did.unittitle: Diploma for B. Randolph Kennon 1892 June 29

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in the M.D. Course in Anatomy for B. Randolph Kennon

did.unittitle: Diploma for B. Randolph Kennon 1892 September 21

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in the M.D. Course in Materia Medica for B. Randolph Kennon

did.unittitle: Certificate for William P. Mark 1971

scopecontent.p: Certificate for membership in Alpha Omega Alpha at the University of Virginia for William Mark

did.unittitle: Certificate for Guy Miller 1899 June 30

scopecontent.p: Certificate for Guy Miller, M.D. for attending the course of Clinical Lectures on all branches of Medicine and Surgery from May 8th to June 20th, 1899, at the San Francisco Polyclinic Post Graduate Medical Department of the University of California. It is signed by Leo Newmark, M.D. and Henry Krentzmann. Donated by Addeane Calleigh on January 5, 2015.

did.unittitle: Diploma for James Clayton Reed 1868 July 2

scopecontent.p: This is a diploma from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in the School of Moral Philosophy for James Reed. James was a brother of Walter Reed. The diploma was given to the UVa medical library by Mrs. Leslie A. Faudree, a great niece of James Clayton Reed and the wife of Lesie A. Faudree, M.D., Class of 1939, UVA School of Medicine.

did.unittitle: Certificate for James Clayton Reed 1868 July 2

scopecontent.p: This is a certificate from the University of Virginia for being Proficient in the Class of Political Economy for James Reed. James was a brother of Walter Reed. This certificate is rolled and loose in the box, not in a Mylar cover.

did.unittitle: Diploma for Catherine Marie Russell 1951 June 11

scopecontent.p: Diploma from the University of Virginia for a Doctor of Philosophy in Biology for Catherine Russell

did.unittitle: Certificate for Catherine Marie Russell 1962 July

scopecontent.p: Certificate from the American Board of Medical Microbiology for qualification in Medical and Public Health Microbiology to Catherine Russell

did.unittitle: Certificate for Margaret Ora Rust 1919 June 12

scopecontent.p: Certificate for Margaret Rust for completing three year course in the University of Virginia Hospital School of Nursing (Donated by Dr. and Mrs. Delmar Weaver)

did.unittitle: Certificate for Margaret Ora Rust 1903 May 14

scopecontent.p: Certificate from the Nurses Examining Board for the State of Virginia for Margaret Rust for meeting requirements for being a registered nurse (Donated by Dr. and Mrs. Delmar Weaver)

did.unittitle: Diploma for Charles Slaughter 1877

scopecontent.p: Certificate for Charles Slaughter, M.D. of Lynchburg, Virginia. Certificate is for private instruction in Physical Diagnosis by Prof. Alfred L. Loomis. Reads "... has been a member of my class in Physical Diagnosis and has pursued the study of the same in the Wards of Bellevue Hospital in the year A.D. One thousand eight hundred and seventy vii, I hereby confer this certificate." It is signed by Alfred Lebbeus Loomis, Professor of Practice of Medicine and Pathology Medical Department, University of the City of New York. This was formerly artifacts01039 and was donated by C. Marshall Lee, Jr., Slaughter's grandson, and accessioned in 2000.

did.unittitle: Diploma for Charles Steele 1875 July 1

scopecontent.p: Diploma for Charles Steele from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in the School of Latin

did.unittitle: Diploma for Charles Steele 1875 July 1

scopecontent.p: Diploma for Charles Steele from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in French Language and Literature

did.unittitle: Diploma for Charles Steele 1876 June 29

scopecontent.p: Diploma for Charles Steele from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in German Language and Literature

did.unittitle: Diploma for Charles Steele 1876 June 29

scopecontent.p: Diploma for Charles Steele from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in School of Greek

did.unittitle: Diploma for Charles Steele 1876 June 29

scopecontent.p: Diploma for Charles Steele from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in School of Pure Mathematics

did.unittitle: Certificate of Proficiency for Charles Steele 1877 June 28

scopecontent.p: Certificate for Charles Steele from the University of Virginia for being proficient in Literature and Rhetoric

did.unittitle: Diploma for Charles Steele 1877 June 28

scopecontent.p: Diploma for Charles Steele from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in School of General Chemistry

did.unittitle: Diploma for Charles Steele 1877 June 28

scopecontent.p: Diploma for Charles Steele from the University of Virginia for being a Graduate in School of Moral Philosophy

did.unittitle: Diploma for Ermoye Avise Stoll 1948 June 14

scopecontent.p: Diploma for Ermoye Stoll from the University of Virginia for a Bachelor of Science in Nursing Education

did.unittitle: Certificate for Oscar Swineford 1926

scopecontent.p: Certificate for Oscar Swineford from Alpha Omega Alpha declaring his membership

did.unittitle: Certificate for Oscar Swineford [1972]

scopecontent.p: Certificate is for Oscar Swineford from the American Association of Certified Allergists for serving as President from 1971 to 1972

did.unittitle: Certificate for Oscar Swineford 1943 June 11

scopecontent.p: Certificate is for Oscar Swineford from the American Board of Internal Medicine for being certified to practice Internal Medicine, Allergy

did.unittitle: Certificate for Virginia Lassiter Williams September 30

scopecontent.p: Certificate is for Virginia Lassiter Williams from the University of Virginia Hospital School of Nursing to certify completion of a three year course.

did.unittitle: Certificate for Emma Garnett Wood 1903 June 17

scopecontent.p: Certificate for Emma Wood for completing a two year course in the University of Virginia Hospital School of Nursing (Wood was in the first graduating class of only three)

did.unittitle: Certificate for Fletcher D. Woodward 1923 April 1

scopecontent.p: Certificate for Fletcher Woodward from the Board of Directors of the Manhattan Eye, Ear and Throat Hospital for serving one year as an Assistant and House Surgeon in the Eye Department
